response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, I estimate its value to be well above $8,000. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to purchase the product at a special price of $12,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly if you're interested. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your response.", "product_price": 12000}
